backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization and blob storage mixins, plus data models and comparison helpers for residents, physicians, medications, and related entities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend registration bootstrap fix, listing affected files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files covering components, pages, hooks, styling, and utility logic.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Primary production deployment checklist detailing verification steps, manual and scripted deployment options, logging, and rollback procedures.
frontend/deployment_logs/.gitkeep: Describes the purpose and structure of the deployment logs directory and the metadata generated by deployment scripts.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Historical deployment checklist for Version 89 outlining build, deploy, retry script usage, and smoke-test references.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and numerous CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border, background, and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the frontend app via main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/public/build-meta.json: Placeholder JSON file for build metadata, overwritten during deployment.
frontend/scripts/clean_redeploy_producti: Script that cleans previous build artifacts, injects build metadata, rebuilds the frontend, and redeploys to the IC network with logging.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Historical script for retrying Version 89 publish‑only deployment, building the frontend and deploying to the IC network.
frontend/scripts/post_deploy_smoke_test_: Interactive helper script guiding operators through smoke tests and verifying recent deployment artifacts.
frontend/scripts/redeploy_production.sh: Script that builds the frontend with injected metadata and redeploys it to the IC network while recording logs and canister IDs.
frontend/scripts/restart_backend_caniste: Utility script to start or restart the backend canister on the IC network and verify its final status.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: Detailed post-deployment smoke test instructions for Version 89 covering login, authentication, dashboard loading, and error checking.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry defining routes and handling authentication, actor initialization, and backend health checks with multiple loading and failure states.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Modal form for creating an ADL record, validating required inputs and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog for recording daily vital signs, converting date/time to nanoseconds and submitting through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Form dialog to add a medication administration record for a resident, selecting active medications and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Modal for adding a new medication to a resident, including route, dosage, administration times, and physician lookup.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Dialog form to add a new resident with admin checks and multi-section data entry for physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for recording a resident’s weight entry, validating required fields and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Logo component that loads a branded image with size modes and a text fallback on load error.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsIndic: Displays frontend build info, backend canister ID, and warnings when metadata or connections are missing.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog for editing a resident’s medication with pre-filled fields and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Comprehensive editor for resident details with admin guard, pre-filled data, and full multi-section updates.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for entering and saving a user's name and employee ID using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays detailed startup errors, including canister status, diagnostics, and retry/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user registration, profile loading, and various backend data operations with timeouts and error mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with timeouts and optional admin initialization, handling non-fatal errors and preventing auto-retries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, forces opaque dialog styles, and includes print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides timeout wrapping and detailed error classification helpers for backend actor initialization.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Generates normalized asset URLs using Vite base paths to avoid double slashes and ensure correct deployment paths.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Retrieves build metadata from env vars or a fallback file and constructs version identifiers with environment detection.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts dates to/from nanoseconds and provides formatting and age calculation without timezone issues.
frontend/src/lib/registrationErrorMappin: Maps backend registration errors to user-friendly messages and detects anonymous or provisioning-specific errors.
frontend/src/lib/residentEnumMapping.ts: Maps frontend select values to backend enum types for room type and resident status with backward-compatible aliases.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Provides backend diagnostics extraction from environment and performs a timeout‑protected health check call.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines centralized timeout constants used during application startup.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the resident dashboard with active/discharged lists, admin actions, and retry/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the Internet Identity login screen with branding and login state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Shows a detailed resident profile with admin‑gated editing, tabs, and retryable data loading.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended shadows, animations, and typography/container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing registration issues, architectural notes, and pending feature requests to fix baseline user registration and improve backend error signaling.
